attributes.action: recognise the honour and respect shown by the population of Wooton Bassett to the return of soldiers killed in Afghanistan, by bestowing on that town an honour or medal, as Malta in the 2nd World War, for their actions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the respect shown by the population at every funeral procession through the town is far beyond normal behaviour and deserves accreditation by the awarding of a high honour

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
